original: 小的在<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>助大人實行屯田，此季收穫喜人，農業有大幅進展，共計<color=#bceea7>$num1</color>。
text: The small one helped the adults to implement farming in <color=#bceea7>$city1</color>. The harvest this season is gratifying and the agriculture has made great progress, totaling <color=#bceea7>$num1</color>.
